snippet: Lisa Raymond assumed she had played the last match of her career after a defeat in women’s doubles, but moments later, she was summoned to play a mixed doubles match.
abstract: Lisa Raymond is called as alternate for mixed doubles tournament at United States Open only moments after losing in what she believed to be final match of her career; teams with Jamie Murray for victory over Abigail Spears and Scott Lipsky.
lead_paragraph: Lisa Raymond assumed she had played the last match of her career after a defeat in women’s doubles, but moments later, she was summoned to play a mixed doubles match.

headline.main: A Defeat. Retirement. Then a Win. All in a Day.
headline.print_headline: A Defeat. Retirement. Then a Win. All in a Day.
